title:
Andhra Pradesh Irrigation & Livelihood
Improvement Project (APILIP-II)
short_desc:
Strengthening WUAs and irrigation-linked
livelihoods (JICA funded).
long_desc: APILIP-II strengthens Water User Associations (WUAs), improves irrigation infrastructure, and supports allied livelihoods. Activities include capacity building, technical assistance, farmer training across WUAs, institutional strengthening, and promotion of sustainable water use.

title:
Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM) - VWSC
Capacity Building
short_desc:
Capacity building for Village Water &
Sanitation Committees on sustainable WASH.
long_desc: JJM-linked activities focused on capacitating Village Water & Sanitation Committees (VWSCs) and frontline service providers. The goal was to enhance community management capabilities for water supply and sanitation services across the targeted areas.
partners: Department of Rural Water Supply & Sanitation, GoAP

title:
Promotion of Organic Farming &
Biofertilizers
short_desc:
Farmer field schools and bio-resource centre
activities supporting organic farming.
long_desc: This program supports farmers in adopting organic practices. Support is provided through Farmer Field Schools, training on biofertilizer production, and enabling access to products from the bio-resource center for sustainable agriculture.
locations: KV Palle cluster and Chittoor district

title:
Entrepreneurship Skill Development
Programmes (ESDPs)
short_desc:
Skill development and placement support
for rural youth.
long_desc: ESDPs provided vocational skill training in multiple trades to unemployed youth. The program included comprehensive placement support, with nearly two-thirds of the trainees successfully finding employment post-training completion.

title:
PREVENT IT - Antibiotic Resistance
Awareness
short_desc:
Awareness campaigns on prevention of
antibiotic resistance (EU & Chitkara University).
long_desc: PREVENT IT delivered empowerment camps and awareness activities across academic and community forums. The main goal was to sensitize stakeholders about antibiotic resistance and promote prudent, responsible antibiotic use.

title:
Study for Monitoring & Documentation
of MGNREGS
short_desc:
Monitoring MGNREGS convergence initiatives
in Chittoor and YSR Kadapa.
long_desc: This study focused on the convergence of MGNREGS initiatives. It involved secondary data collection, comprehensive surveys of beneficiaries, and physical verification of assets created under the scheme in the target districts.

title: Women Empowerment in Farmer Producer Organizations
short_desc:
Promoting women's participation and
leadership in FPOs.
long_desc: Interventions were designed to ensure strong women's representation in FPO executive committees. This included targeted capacity building for women and dedicated support for establishing and scaling up women-led livelihood enterprises.

title:
Natural Resource Management (NRM) -
Living Soils & Learning Sites
short_desc:
Natural Resource Management demonstrations, living soils and
learning sites.
long_desc: NRM activities included the development of living soils and learning sites, creating borewell inventories with GIS mapping, and conducting demonstrations. The aim was to substantially improve soil health and moisture retention capabilities.

title:
Andhra Pradesh Integrated Irrigation &
Agriculture Transformation Project
short_desc:
Support to minor irrigation and WUA
strengthening (World Bank funded).
long_desc: APIIATP provides support for minor irrigation schemes and strengthens local institutions like WUAs and FPOs. Activities included farmer trainings, establishing demonstration plots, and coordination with government line departments.

title:
Andhra Pradesh Community Based Tank
Management Project (APCBTMP)
short_desc:
Minor irrigation tanks development and
WUA capacity building.
long_desc: APCBTMP focused on minor irrigation tank development and built the capacity of WUAs in water management. Activities included promoting collective agri-business and conducting agri demonstrations to enhance productivity and sustainability.

title:
NABARD Watershed Development
Programme
short_desc:
Watershed activities to enhance water
security and livelihoods in KV Palle Mandal.
long_desc: NABARD-supported interventions focused on soil and water conservation measures within the watershed. This included livelihood support and strengthening community institutions in KV Palle Mandal to improve local resilience.

title:
Pallejeevam - Andhra Pradesh Drought
Mitigation Project (APDMP)
short_desc:
Drought mitigation with focus on FPO
promotion, CLICs and CHCs.
long_desc: APDMP emphasized community-based drought mitigation by promoting Farmer Producer Organisations (FPOs). The project established Climate Information Centres (CLICs) and Custom Hiring Centres (CHCs) to support smallholder farmers.

title:
Mana Vittana Kendramu (MVK) -
Seed Production & Banks
short_desc:
Local seed production and seed bank
establishment to promote seed sovereignty.
long_desc: MVK supports the local production and storage of breeder seeds and facilitates their distribution to farmers. The program also actively promotes local seed conservation practices to ensure the availability of quality seeds.

title:
Bio-Resource Centres 
(Production and dissemination of Organic Inputs)
short_desc:
Production and dissemination of organic inputs
like Jeevamrutham and Neemasthram.
long_desc: Bio-resource centres produce organic formulations (Jeevamrutham, Ganajeevamrutham, etc.). They also provide vital training on organic practices and support farmers as they transition to more sustainable agriculture methods.

title:
Support for Climate-Resilient
Cropping Systems
short_desc:
Promoting millets and other drought-resistant
crops to enhance local climate resilience.
long_desc: The program promotes climate-resilient cropping patterns. This includes the distribution of Navadhanya kits and support for traditional millet cultivation to reduce water stress and significantly improve overall agricultural resilience.

title:
Groundwater Management &
Rainwater Harvesting Training
short_desc:
Training communities on groundwater
conservation and rainwater harvesting.
long_desc: The program provided community trainings and technical support for adopting rainwater harvesting and groundwater recharge techniques. It aimed to build local capacity for sustainable, long-term water management.

title:
Natural Resource Management (NRM) -
Living Soils & Learning Sites
short_desc:
Natural Resource Management demonstrations, living soils and
learning sites.
long_desc: NRM activities included the development of living soils and learning sites, creating borewell inventories with GIS mapping, and conducting demonstrations. The aim was to substantially improve soil health and moisture retention capabilities.

title: Drip Irrigation Implementation
short_desc:
Targeted drip irrigation support to farmers
for efficient water use.
long_desc: The program provided and offered technical support for the installation of drip irrigation systems. This initiative was crucial for optimizing water use and achieving improved crop yields on smallholder landholdings.

title: Soil Health Improvement Initiatives
short_desc:
Soil testing, fertigation, gypsum distribution
and organic inputs.
long_desc: Interventions promoted soil testing-based fertilizer use, distributed gypsum, and encouraged fertigation and organic inputs. These measures were implemented to protect overall soil health and substantially increase agricultural productivity.

title:
Climate Information Centres (CLICs) –
Local Hubs for Farmer Advisories
short_desc:
Local CLIC centres to disseminate climate
and agriculture advisories.
long_desc: CLICs provide audiovisual resources, specialist sessions, and essential equipment support to farmer groups. This setup enables the timely dissemination of climate-smart advisories and practices, supporting resilient farming.

title:
CHAMAN Project (Horticulture
Assessment & Management)
short_desc:
Primary horticulture data collection and
crop cutting experiments.
long_desc: CHAMAN involved large-scale primary data collection on horticulture crops across numerous villages. It also included conducting Crop Cutting Experiments (CCEs) to support detailed crop-level planning and agricultural research.

title:
Baseline Survey of Horticulture -
Kolar (Karnataka)
short_desc:
Baseline survey and large-scale farmer
registration in Kolar district.
long_desc: A comprehensive baseline survey was conducted across Hoblis, registering hundreds of thousands of horticulture farmers. The detailed farmer-level data was successfully entered into government portals.

title:
Baseline Survey of Horticulture -
Chittoor (AP)
short_desc:
Baseline survey and farmer registration
across Chittoor district.
long_desc: The project registered detailed farmer-level horticulture data across all mandals of Chittoor. The data was successfully integrated with the state horticulture portals, providing valuable planning information.

title:
Skill Development for Rural Youth
& Women
short_desc:
Vocational training, entrepreneurship
and placement support.
long_desc: A wide range of skill development interventions targeted rural youth and women. The goal was to enhance employability and local entrepreneurship through effective training, mentorship, and vital market linkages.

title: Women Empowerment in Farmer Producer Organizations
short_desc:
Promoting women's participation and
leadership in FPOs.
long_desc: Interventions were designed to ensure strong women's representation in FPO executive committees. This included targeted capacity building for women and dedicated support for establishing and scaling up women-led livelihood enterprises.

title:
Health & Nutrition Awareness
during COVID-19
short_desc:
Emergency relief and awareness activities
during the pandemic.
long_desc: The program delivered emergency relief, including the distribution of masks, fruits, and vegetables. Awareness programs on hand hygiene, sanitation, and nutrition were conducted for vulnerable families during the COVID-19 pandemic.
locations: Kalakada; Kalikiri; KV Palli; Chinnagottigalu Mandals

title:
Community-Based Training for ANMs,
ASHAs & Anganwadi Workers
short_desc:
Training frontline health workers on
sanitation, WASH and community hygiene.
long_desc: Capacity building sessions were held for government frontline workers (ANMs, ASHAs, Anganwadi). The goal was to strengthen local WASH services and improve community health outreach in the region.

title:
Veterinary Support to POP Families
(Poultry & Small Ruminants)
short_desc:
Support for poultry and small ruminant
rearers including local breed promotion.
long_desc: The program provided veterinary services, vaccination drives, and support for local breed poultry entrepreneurs. It also distributed subsidized cattle feed to improve the livelihoods of vulnerable POP families.

title:
Verification of Nirmal Gram Puraskar
(NGP) Awards
short_desc:
Evaluation and verification for NGP awards
in multiple districts.
long_desc: This involved third-party verification of NGP awards. Activities included comprehensive data collection, thorough field verification, and reporting to recommend awards across multiple districts.

title:
Third Party Monitoring on AP
Electoral Rolls
short_desc:
Verification and monitoring of electoral
rolls in AP districts.
long_desc: The project involved field verification and data validation of electoral rolls in the target districts. This work was crucial to support transparent and accurate electoral processes.

title:
3rd Party Evaluation under RKVY
(Agriculture & Organic Farming)
short_desc:
Third-party evaluation of RKVY initiatives
in several districts.
long_desc: This was a third-party evaluation of RKVY-funded agriculture and organic farming initiatives. It involved field surveys, interviews with farmers, assessment of implementation, followed by detailed reporting and recommendations.

title:
Process Monitoring of APDPIP &
APRPRP (Velugu Project)
short_desc:
Process monitoring of poverty eradication
programmes across multiple districts.
long_desc: Monitoring and reporting focused on the delivery of poverty eradication programs. This included training for community coordinators and utilizing participatory rural appraisal tools to accurately assess program outcomes.

title:
Pallejeevam - Andhra Pradesh Drought
Mitigation Project (APDMP)
short_desc:
Drought mitigation with focus on FPO
promotion, CLICs and CHCs.
long_desc: APDMP emphasized community-based drought mitigation by promoting Farmer Producer Organisations (FPOs). The project established Climate Information Centres (CLICs) and Custom Hiring Centres (CHCs) to support smallholder farmers.
